divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along rt 29 south toward rt 309, when I noticed a bunch of unexplainable orange lights hovering. I kept looking out driver side window repeating to myself "What is that" after reaching open area next to Dallas high school sign they were gone from my sight due to tree cover. Looked just like balls from Fayetville show but about 1,000 feet up and twenty not three.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Wilkes-Barre
There were no other sightings in Wilkes-Barre on or around July 4th 2010
Summary: 20ish glowing orange balls too high and stationary to be explained
